oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Stanley Methodist Church correspondence with Raymond B. Witt, 1955 November 16
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Walker, Frank S.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Letter to Raymond B. Witt from Frank S. Walker, minister of the Stanley Methodist Church in Chattanooga, Tennessee offering advice on how best to integrate the public school system.
